author: sdeboy
msg: Corrected some comments and added attribution

author: sdeboy
msg: New test class for working through expression building and evaluation - supporting infix to postfix conversion, boolean operators and custom operators (regexp, partial text match, etc.)

author: psmith
msg: For a bit of fun, I added a Data Rate concept to the
object that receives and processes events inside Chainsaw,
and displayed it in the Status bar.

author: psmith
msg: Modified the mechanism used for Coloring an event row.
A default Colourizer is used initially that colors Warn levels Yellow
and Error and Fatal events red.
A Rule based Colorizer will be introduced eventually.

author: psmith
msg: Changing between Cyclic and Unlimited mode is now supported, and
can be done via the GUI.  The default is Cyclic, with a 5000 event
There is no way to change the bounds of the Cyclic model at this time,
